channel.title: Changing gp
channel.description: So I had this new idea of changing gp into gold bars as well. So basically, I changed the price of gold bars to 1 billion gp, so rares would be 10 gold bars. So I made a shop that sells gold bars for 1 billion gp, So I want to make it so phats and other rare items use gold bars for buying instead of normal gp while all the other items use gp. Is this possible?

item.title: Changing gp
item.dc:creator: @darrenshan darrenshan
item.description:
@darrenshan wrote:

I know how to add a pk point shop but its very different to a gold bar shop
anyone give me a tut on how to do this please?

Read full topic

item.title: Changing gp

item.description:
@darrenshan wrote:

So I had this new idea of changing gp into gold bars as well.
So basically, I changed the price of gold bars to 1 billion gp, so rares would be 10 gold bars.
So I made a shop that sells gold bars for 1 billion gp,
So I want to make it so phats and other rare items use gold bars for buying instead of normal gp while all the other items use gp.
Is this possible?
